name: nwsomeHabr
description: Dark gray and orange style for Habrahabr, Geektimes, and TMFeed.
additional_info:
Features:

  • Dark gray background, light gray and orange text
  • Adblock 'reminders' as well as some promotional content hidden
  • Icons colored to fit in (mostly orange)
  • Images are inverted and blended UNLESS HOVERED OVER

Stylus sources availiable at GitHub(see habr directory)


My other styles (pretty similar):

  • YouTube
  • Chrome/Chromium scrollbars
